full_description:
Huntkey SZM401 4 Port Socket 2Core Cable Power Strip

Huntkey SZM401 4 Port Socket 2Core Cable Power Strip is built with 4 AC universal Sockets, Flame retardant material, Integral copper bar. At the same time you can charge four devices and it is also applicable to different standards of plugs. This power strip has 3M cable with Integral Copper Bar that Improves product durability & safety and Reduces heat build up to save energy. In this power strip, the 750 C Flame Retardant Material is able to withstand high heat & temperature with No Deformation at 100 c and Resistant to crashing and wet. The Plug Friendly socket is perfectly designed sockets that plugs can be easiely put in and pulled out to improve user experience. You can be easily mounted to the wall with two keyhole mouning slots on the back and also it has thicker heavy duty cord for durability ,safety & energy efficiency.

The Huntkey SZM401 comes with 03 years of warranty.

Huntkey SZN501 5 Port 3 Pin Power Strip with Surge protection

Huntkey SZN501 is a 5 Port AC Socket Power Strip. It lets you charge five devices at the same time. It comes with Surge protection. It has a child protection shutter. It prevents children from putting fingers into the sockets and getting an electric shock. Internal copper bar improves product durability and reduces heat buildup to save energy. It is built with 750â„ƒ flame-retardant material. It is able to withstand high heat and temperature. It has a 3-meter long durable power cord. It is a heavy-duty cord for durability, safety, and energy efficiency. It has been perfectly designed sockets that plugs can be easily put in and pulled out to improve user experience. It can be easily mounted to the wall with two keyhole mounting slots on the back. This is a great power strip offered by Huntkey and it has 3 years warranty.

full_description:
Huntkey PZC504 FivePorts 3 Line Surge Protection PowerStrip

  • 5 Sockets w/ Power Switch
  • Full 3-lines surge protection inside (L-N, L-PE,N-PE)
  • 375 Joules
  • Maximum spike current 4,500 AMPS
  • With 10A sensitive overload protector
  • 3 Meter
  • MAX 2500W- MAX 10A, 250VAC

Huntkey power strips have been designed keeping in mind convenience of use, functionality and portability. Apart from excellent quality and safety, these power strips come with a touch of style. The Huntkey Power Strip PZC504-2 comes in a sober white colour. With five sockets on it and proper spacing between them, you can connect plugs effortlessly. Also, each socket has an independent switch for easy use.

It comes with full 3-lines surge protection inside (L-N, L-PE, N-PE). The maximum spike current is 4,500 amps. The sensitive overload protector saves from overload. All you need to do is just push the button and the overload status comes back to the normal status. It also has an independent three-wire lightening-protection switch.


03 years Warranty

Huntkey SZM804 Eight Port Surge Protection Power Strip

This power strip is built in 750 degree celcius flame retardant material, and able to withstand high heat and temparature and resistant to crashing, heat and wet. It's durable power cord is built in thicker heavy -duty cord for durability, safety and energy-efficiency. It's cable length is 200cm and 24.0cm(L)*11.2cm(W)*2.9cm(H).
